data.body:
We’ve got some good and bad news for you.

First the bad…

If you go out and spend $200+ on a fancy new blender like a Vitamix… then discover it’s really not worth what you paid…

There’s a good chance you will NOT be able to get a refund.

HOWEVER…

The good news is that my friends just introduced a fantastic alternative that blows expensive blenders out of the water.

And even better…

They’re handing it out FREE today.

That’s right…

To celebrate the release of this new Portable Minerix Blender…

500 of these blenders are being handed out FREE right here.

You need to move fast if you want one though.

The last time they did a giveaway like this… it was over in a matter of hours.

Plus, this email just went out to over 124,000 other subscribers – who are reading this and about to try and grab one Free just like you.

So don’t wait around.

Click HERE to see if you can still get a FREE Portable Minerix Blender, before they’re all gone!


If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you may unsubscribe by clicking here or by writing to Offer Wave, 100 Carr 115, PMB 788, Rincon, AL, 00677, US

The people at Magic Bullet Blender are going to be p*ssed about this…

Because a free alternative to their overpriced blenders just became available.

What is it?

It’s these incredible Portable Blenders that my friends are handing out FREE today.

We’re calling them “Magic Bullet Killers” since they do the same thing – except they’re free right now.

All you have to do is confirm your info at the link below, and your Free Portable Blender will ship out ASAP.

Portable blenders like this normally cost at least fifty bucks.

But if you’re one of the next 382 people, it’s yours for nothing.

(They started with 500 to give away, but I'm told they’re going faster than planned.)

Click here to see if you can still grab one of these Free Portable Blenders – before someone else does.


If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you may unsubscribe by clicking here or by writing to Offer Wave, 100 Carr 115, PMB 788, Rincon, AL, 00677, US
